div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222585009 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical T category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222587001 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical M category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222588006 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical N category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222589003 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological T category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222590007 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological N category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222591006 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological M category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222592004 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical stage group allowable value)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222593009 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological stage group allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222594003 (American Joint Committee on Cancer yp stage group allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222595002 (American Joint Committee on Cancer ypT category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222596001 (American Joint Committee on Cancer ypN category allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222598000 (American Joint Committee on Cancer clinical grade allowable value)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222599008 (American Joint Committee on Cancer pathological grade allowable value (qualifier value))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222600006 (American Joint Committee on Cancer yp grade allowable value)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222601005 (American Joint Committee on Cancer residual tumour allowable value)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258318002 (Generic anatomical site tumor invasion status)
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258309004 (Generic lymph node tumor invasion status stage (tumor staging))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258233007 (Generic tumor staging descriptor (tumor staging))
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 258271004 (Specific tumor staging descriptor (tumor staging))

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
42114005Walter Reed stage 1 (tumor staging)
15972002Walter Reed stage 2 (tumor staging)
13808002Walter Reed stage 3 (tumor staging)
74542008Walter Reed stage 4 (tumor staging)
66470009Walter Reed stage 5 (tumor staging)
83200007Walter Reed stage 6 (tumor staging)

publisher.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

name.value: IDG Institut für digitale Gesundheitsdaten RLP gGmbH

description.value: The result of cancer staging, i.e., the stage or category of the cancer.
